content:
The American company Tetra Tech - one of the world leaders in demining - has passed the Center for Perfection of Mine Activity Four Ford pickups.

About thisreportedin the Main Directoratemine activity, civil protection and environmental safety.

"Representatives of the US company Tetra Tech, which is the manager of the US Department of State in the framework of the project of logistical assistance to our country, transferred the Center for Perfection of Mine Activities and Environmental Safety, which is under the control of the Main Directorate, four Ford pickups," the military said.

High -end cars will be used by coordination groups operating in the Nikolaev, Kherson and Kharkiv regions.

According to Ruslan Beregul, Tetra Tech, the head of the Main Directorate of Mine Activities, Civil Protection and Environmental Safety, Tetra Tech has already proven itself as a reliable partner; In addition to material and technical support, it also assists in the preparation of our mine specialists.

As reportedArmyinform, the sappers of the State Security Service for a week neutralized 2755 explosive objects.
title: Leading World Demand Company transferred to the military four Ford pickups
description: This was reported in the General Directorate of Mine Activities, Civil Protection and ...
author: Army Inform
